ActionGuide.ActionMenu_00_310: [UE:Meta key="a778779f26894357a1ce0a535dfdc1cd" Scale="1"/]How to Use Radar Map (1)
ActionGuide.ActionMenu_00_320: [UE:Meta key="8b417cce6a0342a69efa11aaf8912e61" Scale="1"/]How to Use Radar Map (2)
ActionGuide.ActionMenu_00_330: [UE:Meta key="3d4680e19c464c58bc6fb710c3da3ceb" Scale="1"/]How to Use Radar Map (3)
ActionGuide.ActionMenu_00_335: [UE:Meta key="a7642370cd8446349f5ee8eda7d152da" Scale="1"/]How to Use Radar Map (4)
ActionGuide.ActionMenu_00_362: [UE:Meta key="93ab85a40179477dbeacf18b9c84ccb5" Scale="1"/]How to Use Field Guides (1)
ActionGuide.ActionMenu_00_363: [UE:Meta key="6b8a6c2b2bc34c9789b6e80a0ba98980" Scale="1"/]How to Use Field Guides (2)
ActionGuide.ActionMenu_00_364: [UE:Meta key="0f43fa261ae645f08e3037a06e626177" Scale="1"/]How to Use Field Guides (3)
ActionGuide.ActionMenu_00_365: [UE:Meta key="02479083597b47b69dead5f7f0ce698e" Scale="1"/]How to Use Field Guides (4)
ActionGuide.ActionMenu_00_366: [UE:Meta key="5c6bb526a0ae4918847caea94409d209" Scale="1"/]How to Use Field Guides (5)
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_000: [UE:Meta key="8689e2780c164a9ca4c5d0aa59832577" Scale="1"/]Use [PictureFont:IconData key="Move" scale="0.66"/] to move player avatar or [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Happy_Blue" scale="0.66"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_010:
[UE:Meta key="0d2b37aec20741ca821e2fa699f11e62" Scale="1"/]Use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Horizon_R_Stick" scale="0.66"/] to look around. Tilt [PictureFont:IconData key="Down_R_Stick" scale="0.66"/] for an aerial view,
and tilt [PictureFont:IconData key="Up_R_Stick" scale="0.66"/] to go back to ground view. Visit Settings
to change the input directions.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_010_Yoko: [UE:Meta key="667eb5e221eb4803a64d48c4a4a68c14" Scale="1"/]To look around, hold down [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_R_Stick" scale="0.66"/] and tilt [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick_LR" scale="0.66"/].
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_020:
[UE:Meta key="7770adb2893942a08a46c046b8b12051" Scale="1"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_ZL_Button" scale="0.66"/] to look straight ahead.
Reset view by pressing [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_R_Stick_Press_R_StickPress_Stick" scale="0.66"/].
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_020_Yoko: [UE:Meta key="167beb0aa6bf4c6d808a3953789d8d44" Scale="1"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_ZL_Button" scale="0.66"/] to look straight ahead.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_030:
[UE:Meta key="d165ff3323404e449abc55f802d8b328" Scale="1"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Button" scale="0.66"/] or [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_R_Button" scale="0.66"/] to scroll through your squad to
select Pikmin or [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Happy_Blue" scale="0.66"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. Tap [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Button" scale="0.66"/] and [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_R_Button" scale="0.66"/] together
to select [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Happy_Blue" scale="0.66"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] immediately.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_030_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="c0236c03e90b41c389fe1804da8e9b7f" Scale="1"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_R_Button" scale="0.66"/] to scroll through your squad
to select Pikmin or [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Happy_Blue" scale="0.66"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_040: [UE:Meta key="776a3569e30c4a4bb72b0110e03f6df5" Scale="1"/]Select Pikmin and press [PictureFont:IconData key="Toss" scale="0.66"/].
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_050: [UE:Meta key="7a094e4384924c60bb969e22dd901f87" Scale="1"/]Select [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Happy_Blue" scale="0.66"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and press [PictureFont:IconData key="Toss" scale="0.66"/].
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_060:
[UE:Meta key="fd5a401674da45ba9a9bc27ebf8e5f2f" Scale="1"/]Approach a Pikmin sprout and press [PictureFont:IconData key="Pull" scale="0.66"/].
Press [PictureFont:IconData key="PullCancel" scale="0.66"/] to stop plucking.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_070:
[UE:Meta key="7ead75d7ce494accbc5dfa6b74d1370f" Scale="1"/]While playing as your avatar, press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button" scale="0.66"/] when your
squad doesn't have [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Happy_Blue" scale="0.66"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] nor any Pikmin.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_080:
[UE:Meta key="3b9a86673f95406b81e1ac5956c8194a" Scale="1"/]While playing as [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Happy_Blue" scale="0.66"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button" scale="0.66"/] when he
doesn't have any Pikmin with him. While playing
as your avatar, direct him to Bite with [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button" scale="0.66"/].
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_080_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="53924f54e6d8439594e904845604d4da" Scale="1"/]While playing as [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Happy_Blue" scale="0.66"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button" scale="0.66"/] when he
doesn't have any Pikmin with him. While playing
as your avatar, direct him to Bite with [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button" scale="0.66"/].
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_090: [UE:Meta key="58cfa06c4e014a7aacd5962f12221311" Scale="1"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Whistle" scale="0.66"/]. Hold button to increase whistle range.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_100:
[UE:Meta key="f807769aa4014892bc33cbc9b23f9b9e" Scale="1"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Whistle" scale="0.66"/] when playing as [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Happy_Blue" scale="0.66"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Hold button to increase bark range.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_110:
[UE:Meta key="2c9f63c65c89452a9186aaf68c395cfe" Scale="1"/]Use [PictureFont:IconData key="Whistle" scale="0.66"/][PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/] to blow your whistle for an extended
period to summon Pikmin midtask. Blow the
whistle again to summon Pikmin who have
paused their task.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_120: [UE:Meta key="c4d51a9d64d6466db55043444ae6d31a" Scale="1"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Charge" scale="0.66"/] after obtaining the Charging Horn.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_125:
[UE:Meta key="d5ad233a2cbf44b9a6ba207a7d9ef06c" Scale="1"/]After receiving the Lineup Trumpet, hold down [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_ZL_Button_Tairetsufue" scale="0.66"/]
and move [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_R_Stick_Tairetsufue" scale="0.66"/] up, down, left, or right to direct your
squad to face the desired direction.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_140:
[UE:Meta key="07e5530bd87a420ca14159dee5f9d18c" Scale="1"/]After unlocking the ability to ride [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Happy_Blue" scale="0.66"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],
press [PictureFont:IconData key="Ride" scale="0.66"/] when [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Happy_Blue" scale="0.66"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is nearby.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_150:
[UE:Meta key="55ff1cea1ca24405a30d0597755c57f7" Scale="1"/]To dismount [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Happy_Blue" scale="0.66"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], quickly tap [PictureFont:IconData key="GetOff" scale="0.66"/]
or go to Actions and use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick_Down" scale="0.66"/].
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_160:
[UE:Meta key="5077be4a8d054d40a48dcdb9bb138af8" Scale="1"/]After unlocking the ability to use Jump,
press [PictureFont:IconData key="Jump" scale="0.66"/] while playing as [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Happy_Blue" scale="0.66"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_170:
[UE:Meta key="a1725a2b19204c52b31f6261cee46ae0" Scale="1"/]Select [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Happy_Blue" scale="0.66"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and use [PictureFont:IconData key="Dash" scale="0.66"/][PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/] to power up
the gauge. Move [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick" scale="0.66"/] to adjust direction,
then release [PictureFont:IconData key="Dash" scale="0.66"/] to unleash the Rush.
Press any button but [PictureFont:IconData key="Dash" scale="0.66"/] to cancel.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_180:
[UE:Meta key="ff67c7ff7f6d4828a1d72ef78080c975" Scale="1"/]Select Glow Pikmin and use [PictureFont:IconData key="FlashBang" scale="0.66"/][PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/] until gauge is full,
then release [PictureFont:IconData key="FlashBang" scale="0.66"/] to unleash a Glowmob on your
desired target. Press any button but [PictureFont:IconData key="FlashBang" scale="0.66"/] to cancel.
Glowmobs can't be used when playing as [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Happy_Blue" scale="0.66"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_190: [UE:Meta key="d353d3d601514bd8a25da462f6c6dce2" Scale="1"/]Use [PictureFont:IconData key="YMenu" scale="0.66"/][PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/] to display Actions.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_200:
[UE:Meta key="41761f8a78e2420d9dad6b818d4ed31f" Scale="1"/]In the Actions menu, tilt [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick_Left" scale="0.66"/] to select
Command, then press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Y_Button" scale="0.66"/] to open. Visit
"Skills: Command" in the [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] section
of the Gameplay Guide to learn more.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_200_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="daa2ad4722494736863ec42c15cd1d86" Scale="1"/]In the Actions menu, tilt [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick_Left" scale="0.66"/] to select
Command, then press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Y_Button" scale="0.66"/] to open. Visit
"Skills: Command" in the [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] section
of the Gameplay Guide to learn more.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_210:
[UE:Meta key="62d482b6347b43d2b788049260359515" Scale="1"/]In the Actions menu, tilt [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick_Right" scale="0.66"/] to select Pack,
then press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Y_Button" scale="0.66"/] to open. Visit "Types of Items (1-3)"
in the Story section of your Gameplay Guide for
more information about your [Grammar:DefArt/]Pack's contents.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_210_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="e3d8b54ccabc49fc8788c884a97ca2ec" Scale="1"/]In the Actions menu, tilt [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick_Right" scale="0.66"/] to select Pack,
then press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Y_Button" scale="0.66"/] to open. Visit "Types of Items (1-3)"
in the Story section of your Gameplay Guide for
more information about your [Grammar:DefArt/]Pack's contents.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_220:
[UE:Meta key="216074ef8e40455c851663910735d4e1" Scale="1"/]In the Actions menu, tilt [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick_Up" scale="0.66"/] to select Disband,
then press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Y_Button" scale="0.66"/] to confirm. Pikmin other than
the currently selected type will disband.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_220_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="65e52e825e0e480bb0c1142fb71d4e27" Scale="1"/]In the Actions menu, tilt [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick_Up" scale="0.66"/] to select Disband,
then press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Y_Button" scale="0.66"/] to confirm. Pikmin other than
the currently selected type will disband.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_230:
[UE:Meta key="aed5597a791f4e159a90be3bec0e08d0" Scale="1"/]All Pikmin and [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Happy_Blue" scale="0.66"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] will disband at once.
Assign the command in Shortcut Settings.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_240:
[UE:Meta key="a85e4045cb9d43ac967afeb02a600f26" Scale="1"/]In the Actions menu, tilt [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick_Down" scale="0.66"/] to select Switch,
then press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Y_Button" scale="0.66"/] to confirm. This action will not
be available if you are riding [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Happy_Blue" scale="0.66"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_240_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="e410079dd1384c6cbffbaee11b758e14" Scale="1"/]In the Actions menu, tilt [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick_Down" scale="0.66"/] to select Switch,
then press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Y_Button" scale="0.66"/] to confirm. This action will not
be available if you are riding [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Happy_Blue" scale="0.66"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_250:
[UE:Meta key="5669b403ca8c4d06919918395d453fa9" Scale="1"/]Use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick" scale="0.66"/] to move the cursor to the desired
Auto Target Lock target.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_260:
[UE:Meta key="cb38771f534e4649b3736c404edc0d7a" Scale="1"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="ZR_Button" scale="0.66"/] while Auto Target Lock is activated to fix
the cursor. Press [PictureFont:IconData key="ZR_Button" scale="0.66"/] again to change target.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_260_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="fb0cd9d5b77d44a1958a308b313baace" Scale="1"/]Cannot be selected while
holding controller sideways.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_270:
[UE:Meta key="73db3a3cae234dc18dad1c442b75da3d" Scale="1"/]Use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick" scale="0.66"/] to move the cursor. When Motion Controls
are ON, you can move the cursor by tilting
your controller for some actions.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_290:
[UE:Meta key="ae5c72ececce4374ace3621da665422f" Scale="1"/]When throwing Pikmin or trying to lock onto an
item or object, tilt the controller to move cursor
to the desired location. Motion Controls can also
be used when calling Pikmin with your whistle.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_300:
[UE:Meta key="07d13109f9a44c3cb55088923c4c5f7e" Scale="1"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="STAB" scale="0.66"/] to open the Radar Map, then press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_B_Button" scale="0.66"/] to
display the Tablet menu and change apps. Visit the
Gameplay Guide to learn more about your Tablet.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_310:
[UE:Meta key="8068951fe9e24527abc9fdafacac9251" Scale="1"/]In the Radar Map, hover the cursor over the place
you'd like to go to, then press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button" scale="0.66"/] to automatically
move to that location. This action is only available
after you learn Command Lv. 2 in your training.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_310_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="72a9565e94914b1ca817912a775a0a38" Scale="1"/]In the Radar Map, hover the cursor over the place
you'd like to go to, then press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button" scale="0.66"/] to automatically
move to that location. This action is only available
after you learn Command Lv. 2 in your training.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_320:
[UE:Meta key="aea5824dfe9a4db8959bc9c7a0509bbe" Scale="1"/]Tilt [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Double_Manual_RstUp" scale="0.66"/] to zoom in.
Tilt [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Double_Manual_RstDown" scale="0.66"/] to zoom out.
Move [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick" scale="0.66"/] to adjust position on map.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_320_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="9c1cf56c65d24b91acb2dc632d98ddfb" Scale="1"/]Use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Double_Manual_RstUp" scale="0.66"/] to zoom in.
Use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Double_Manual_RstDown" scale="0.66"/] to zoom out.
Move [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick" scale="0.66"/] to adjust position on map.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_330:
[UE:Meta key="195a4f8776db41569aab2ff305b718da" Scale="1"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_X_Button" scale="0.66"/] to toggle the Radar Map's orientation
between Fixed and the direction of the camera.
You can also adjust this in the Options menu
under Settings.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_335:
[UE:Meta key="448825e422ab4ef3830302735f36f182" Scale="1"/]While at the Rescue Command Post, place the
cursor over whoever you wish to talk to and
press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button" scale="0.66"/] to move to their location instantly.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_335_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="156cf9b6e0b24953b038424dedb35713" Scale="1"/]While at the Rescue Command Post, place the
cursor over whoever you wish to talk to and
press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button" scale="0.66"/] to move to their location instantly.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_340:
[UE:Meta key="572a40b765c04509aa97394e5c1cf8fc" Scale="1"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Option" scale="0.66"/]. Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Option" scale="0.66"/] twice if using horizontal grip.
Visit the Gameplay Guide to learn more about
the Options menu.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_350:
[UE:Meta key="ef114137b40943e483221db651d04a33" Scale="1"/]In the Options menu under Shortcut Settings,
you can assign actions and items to [PictureFont:IconData key="Cross_Button" scale="0.66"/] and [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick_Press_L_Stick" scale="0.66"/].
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_360:
[UE:Meta key="fe66674fbe5f408aa41c1f6e673d2a19" Scale="1"/]When playing the story, press [PictureFont:IconData key="Cross_Button" scale="0.66"/] or [PictureFont:IconData key="Press_L_Stick" scale="0.66"/] to access
your Tablet shortcuts or immediately use items
in your pack.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_360_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="11b7f45284a641f8b401ee4af38183fc" Scale="1"/]When playing the story, press [PictureFont:IconData key="Press_Stick" scale="0.66"/] to access
your Tablet shortcuts or immediately use items
in your pack.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_362:
[UE:Meta key="70058bd9109e4111b30dad2edb51ef15" Scale="1"/]While using Observe in the Piklopedia or Treasure
Catalog, use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick" scale="0.66"/] to change viewpoint, use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Double_Manual_Horizon_R_Stick" scale="0.66"/]
to rotate the camera, use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Double_Manual_PictureBook_RstDown" scale="0.66"/] for an aerial
view, and use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Double_Manual_PictureBook_RstUp" scale="0.66"/] to look closer at a target.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_362_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="b47cd153f46d416bbaee6dfe635b5f86" Scale="1"/]While using Observe in the Piklopedia or Treasure
Catalog, use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick" scale="0.66"/] to change viewpoint, use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Double_Manual_Horizon_R_Stick" scale="0.66"/]
to rotate the camera, use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Double_Manual_PictureBook_RstUp" scale="0.66"/] to look closer at
a target, and use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Double_Manual_PictureBook_RstDown" scale="0.66"/] for an aerial view.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_363:
[UE:Meta key="0abdb96d2f124df1bd82992a3945cbc1" Scale="1"/]When using Observe in the Piklopedia or Treasure
Catalog, press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Double_Manual_ZR" scale="0.66"/] to display Notes.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_363_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="7b28727a00fe43f7a2f3a95dc8866124" Scale="1"/]When using Observe in the Piklopedia or Treasure
Catalog, use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Double_Manual_ZR" scale="0.66"/] to display Notes.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_364:
[UE:Meta key="3e22dbe704d748c0bb05b369a5758f30" Scale="1"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button" scale="0.66"/] to throw an item while observing in the
Piklopedia. Scroll through available items by
pressing [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Button" scale="0.66"/] or [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_R_Button" scale="0.66"/]. Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Y_Button" scale="0.66"/] to switch between day
and night when viewing creatures active at night.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_364_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="45b9ae8addad4a149014a167128f4abe" Scale="1"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button" scale="0.66"/] to throw an item while observing in the
Piklopedia. Scroll through available items by
pressing [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_R_Button" scale="0.66"/]. Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Y_Button" scale="0.66"/] to switch between day
and night when viewing creatures active at night.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_365:
[UE:Meta key="4acceabf14f2446a8a6ab7c151dd0d3d" Scale="1"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button" scale="0.66"/] to examine a treasure from all angles
while observing it in the Treasure Catalog. If the
treasure is interactive, you can press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button" scale="0.66"/] again to
trigger its action.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_365_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="6d460354fc994f9a964ca15a3cfb937f" Scale="1"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button" scale="0.66"/] to examine a treasure from all angles
while observing it in the Treasure Catalog. If the
treasure is interactive, you can press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button" scale="0.66"/] again to
trigger its action.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_366:
[UE:Meta key="0c43833cd0a645adb0136b62082cf6cc" Scale="1"/]In the Piklopedia's Engage mode, you can fight
creatures over and over again. Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Double_PlayManual_PlusMinus" scale="0.66"/] to
open the Options menu to call or return Pikmin,
reset positions, or return to the Piklopedia.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_366_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="e1aa0bbd959647c48dfd5e5f6c88f12a" Scale="1"/]In the Piklopedia's Engage mode, you can fight
creatures over and over again. Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Double_PlayManual_PlusMinus" scale="0.66"/] to
open the Options menu to call or return Pikmin,
reset positions, or return to the Piklopedia.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_370:
[UE:Meta key="27a0d0692ed24173ab9fb66c5bdb55ec" Scale="1"/]Use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick" scale="0.66"/] to move around. Use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Double_Manual_RstUpDown" scale="0.66"/] to move drone
up and down. Use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Double_Manual_Horizon_R_Stick" scale="0.66"/] to rotate drone and
change directions.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_370_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="72161cb92a6243979822a61b25ca3764" Scale="1"/]Use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick" scale="0.66"/] to move around. Use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Double_Manual_RstUpDown" scale="0.66"/] to move drone
up and down. Use [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Double_Manual_Horizon_R_Stick" scale="0.66"/] to rotate drone and
change directions.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_380:
[UE:Meta key="8e53d6ffe3094becb36c55bc90789c30" Scale="1"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Y_Button" scale="0.66"/] to drop up to three landmark pins.
Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_X_Button" scale="0.66"/] to pause/unpause game. Time will pass
when game is unpaused. Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_B_Button" scale="0.66"/] to quit operating
the drone.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_380_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="d4141621056e4572b33b84257d1b009f" Scale="1"/]Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Y_Button" scale="0.66"/] to drop up to three landmark pins.
Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_X_Button" scale="0.66"/] to pause/unpause game. Time will pass
when game is unpaused. Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_B_Button" scale="0.66"/] to quit operating
the drone.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_390:
[UE:Meta key="dbb2b117c20e47babe8f467334e2300c" Scale="1"/]After obtaining a Mystery Capsule item, press [PictureFont:IconData key="UseRoulette" scale="0.66"/]
to use it. Visit the Dandori Battle section of the
Gameplay Guide to learn more about item effects.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_400:
[UE:Meta key="745b599939ce40e4ab7640ed5ce2e969" Scale="1"/]P2 supports P1 by pressing [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button_2P" scale="0.66"/] to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]throw pebbles
at a variety of targets[System:Color name="Default"]. Hit the creatures to help
defeat them and increase transport speed by
hitting objects being transported.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_400_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="5e0cfc56d62c4c1983050dfa245de778" Scale="1"/]P2 supports P1 by pressing [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button_2P" scale="0.66"/] to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]throw pebbles
at a variety of targets[System:Color name="Default"]. Hit the creatures to help
defeat them and increase transport speed by
hitting objects being transported.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_401:
[UE:Meta key="479141ea01324f328ff82780ff73ee0d" Scale="1"/]P2 can support P1 by pressing [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button_2P" scale="0.66"/] to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]throw
pebbles at a variety of targets[System:Color name="Default"]. Hit the creatures
to help defeat them and increase transport speed
by hitting objects being transported.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_401_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="0dbcccd64c17431e81ff6d1497de0b30" Scale="1"/]P2 can support P1 by pressing [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_A_Button_2P" scale="0.66"/] to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]throw
pebbles at a variety of targets[System:Color name="Default"]. Hit the creatures
to help defeat them and increase transport speed
by hitting objects being transported.
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_402:
[UE:Meta key="8d372f76ed4746379c962fdb027c69fe" Scale="1"/]P2 throws an item by pressing [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Y_Button_2P" scale="0.66"/] and selects
items using [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Button_2P" scale="0.66"/] or [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_R_Button_2P" scale="0.66"/].
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_402_Yoko:
[UE:Meta key="4480cf4ba99540bfad4b6e2ea9039e35" Scale="1"/]P2 throws an item by pressing [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Y_Button_2P" scale="0.66"/] and selects
items using [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Button_2P" scale="0.66"/] or [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_R_Button_2P" scale="0.66"/].
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_404:
[UE:Meta key="ba618fce9fc64c858f1894843e0a17be" Scale="1"/]P2 can use Motion Controls to aim the Pebble
Pitcher. Press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_X_Button_2P" scale="0.66"/] to reset the Pebble Pitcher to
the center of the screen. If using Two-Hand Hold,
P2 can also move the Pebble Pitcher with [PictureFont:IconData key="L_Stick_2P" scale="0.66"/].
ActionGuide.ActionContent_00_406:
[UE:Meta key="7d9e3b22854345dabb266b1771ba1910" Scale="1"/]Turn Motion Controls ON/OFF or adjust the
Pebble Pitcher's motion sensitivity in Settings.
